item.title: Michele add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "Every book, every volume you see here, has a soul. The soul of the person who wrote it and of those who read it and lived and dreamed with it. Every time a book changes hands, every time someone runs his eyes down its pages, its spirit grows and strengthens." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Michele add a quote by Charles W. Eliot
item.description: "Books are the quietest and most constant of friends; they are the most accessible and wisest of counselors, and the most patient of teachers." -- Charles W. Eliot

item.title: Michele add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Michele add a quote by Robert A. Heinlein
item.description: "I am free, no matter what rules surround me. If I find them tolerable, I tolerate them; if I find them too obnoxious, I break them. I am free because I know that I alone am morally responsible for everything I do." -- Robert A. Heinlein

item.title: Michele add a quote by Pema Chödrön
item.description: "At the root of all the harm we cause is ignorance." -- Pema Chödrön

item.title: Michele add a quote by Bill Bryson
item.description: "Not one of your pertinent ancestors was squashed, devoured, drowned, starved, stranded, stuck fast, untimely wounded, or otherwise deflected from its life's quest of delivering a tiny charge of genetic material to the right partner at the right moment in order to perpetuate the only possible sequence of hereditary combinations that could result -- eventually, astoundingly, and all too briefly -- in you." -- Bill Bryson

item.title: Michele add a quote by John Milton
item.description: "For books are not absolutely dead things, but do contain a potency of life in them to be as active as that soul was whose progeny they are; nay, they do preserve as in a vial the purest efficacy and extraction of that living intellect that bred them." -- John Milton

item.title: Michele add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "I'm a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Michele add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing." -- Abraham Lincoln
